description.blockquote: "Omnis enim res, quae dando non deficit, dum habetur et non datur, nondum habetur, quomodo habenda est."
"For if a thing is not diminished by being shared with others, it is not rightly owned if it is only owned and not shared."
description.p: was written 397 AD by St. Augustinus in his introduction to "De doctrina christiana" in reference to sharing knowledge through teaching.
